p: In this study, we used the output of six GCMs from CMIP5 (CSIRO-Mk3.6.0, GISS-E2-R, IPSL-CM5a-MR, MIROC5, CCSM4, GFSL-ESM2m; S1 Table) to run three scenarios: a historic run (HISTORIC), the midrange mitigated emission scenario (RCP4.5), and the high emission scenario (RCP8.5) [ 29â€“ 31] with Agro-IBIS [ 21] to predict Iowa maize yield. We also define a Yield Loss Index (YLI) to partition effects of moisture stress from temperature stress.
